text: Love at the Thanksgiving Day Parade is a 2012 American-Canadian romantic comedy. It was directed by Ron Oliver and starred Autumn Reeser and Antonio Cupo. It premiered on Hallmark Channel on November 4, 2012.Original Trailer == Plot == Emily Jones is a passionate and eccentric young woman, with a penchant for dressing exclusively in vintage clothing. Professionally, she is in charge of the Chicago Thanksgiving Day Parade, a project she has devoted herself to heart and soul. But Emily's life gets complicated when she starts working with a man, Henry Williams, whose job is to reduce the parade's budget—which means it will lose much of its charm and magic. Determined to save her "baby", she fights tooth and nail to make him change his mind... and maybe more! ==Cast== *Autumn Reeser as Emily Jones *Antonio Cupo as Henry Williams *April Telek as Donna *Ben Cotton as Brian *Ali Liebert as Jaclyn *Alvin Sanders as Paul ==References== ==External links== * Category:Hallmark Channel original films Category:American films Category:2012 television films Category:2012 romantic comedy films Category:Canadian television films Category:Canadian films Category:Films set in Chicago Category:Films shot in British Columbia
title: Love at the Thanksgiving Day Parade
